about_the_game:
Welcome to a new racing universe. Wheel Stars is the first free-to-play battle royale multiplayer racing game of its kind. A game where you compete and cooperate with your squad to win challenging and fun competitions.

Featuring a dozen unique and creative game modes, you are guaranteed unspoiled gameplay with signature challenges such as getting the flag, team race, parking first, and many other unannounced upcoming activities.

Do your best to earn famous and exclusive models, or use reward points to create your own unique car models.

Immerse yourself in this playful universe and compete against other players online. Or use the direct invite system to play with your friends and host your private contest with your followers.

Be the first to learn about Wheel Stars project updates, WISHLIST NOW, and join our newly established community on Discord to help us shape the game’s future.

About Wheels Start:

Wheel Stars is a passion project developed by some crazy indie Brazilian game developers. Our team has one vision in mind: Your fun comes first.

WISHLIST NOW

  • Multiplayer online/local co-op and competitive.
  • 10+ Game Modes with unique Team Dynamics mechanics
  • Play with friends
  • Customize your car and character
  • 100+ track obstacles
  • Weekly events
  • Tournaments
  • View mode.

Welcome to a new racing universe. Wheel Stars is the first free-to-play battle royale multiplayer racing game of its kind. A game where you compete and cooperate with your squad to win challenging and fun competitions.

Featuring a dozen unique and creative game modes, you are guaranteed unspoiled gameplay with signature challenges such as getting the flag, team race, parking first, and many other unannounced upcoming activities.

name: Wheel Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any quadcore processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: On-board graphics set as "performance"
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any off-board graphics
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: Welcome to a new racing universe. Wheel Stars is the first free-to-play battle royale multiplayer racing game of its kind. A game where you compete and cooperate with your squad to win challenging and fun competitions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
